Package com.mygdx.pirategame.screens

Class GameScreen

java.lang.Object
com.mygdx.pirategame.screens.GameScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
public class GameScreen
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
Game Screen Class to generate the various screens used to play the game. Instantiates all screen types and displays current screen.
Author:
Ethan Alabaster, Adam Crook, Joe Dickinson, Sam Pearson, Tom Perry, Edward Poulter
